lead_paragraph: Chelsea must reach the final of the Champions League and the FA Cup or at least one of them to save their season, goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois said after Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw against Manchester United at home.

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Must Reach FA Cup or Champions League Final-Courtois
headline.main: Chelsea Must Reach FA Cup or Champions League Final-Courtois

snippet: Chelsea must reach the final of the Champions League and the FA Cup or at least one of them to save their season, goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois said after Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw against Manchester United at home....
